Determine individual group side effect BBIC . OUTLINE : This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , study . Prior randomization , patient receive oral placebo 4 week . ARM II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily 6 month absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
